snippet: Jerry Marcus, a former head of Bank of America Merrill Lynch’s retail investment banking group, will become a vice chairman for its Americas investment bank, the Swiss firm said on Thursday.
abstract: Jerry Marcus, a former head of Bank of America Merrill Lynch’s retail investment banking group, will become a vice chairman for its Americas investment bank, the Swiss firm said on Thursday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: UBS Hires Veteran Bank of America Executive
